description: Enterprise techniques used by HUI Loader, ATT&CK software S1097 (v1.0)
name: HUI Loader (S1097)

techniques.comment: [HUI Loader](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1097) can decrypt and load files containing malicious payloads.(Citation: SecureWorks BRONZE STARLIGHT Ransomware Operations June 2022)

[HUI Loader](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1097) can be deployed to targeted systems via legitimate programs that are vulnerable to DLL search order hijacking.(Citation: SecureWorks BRONZE STARLIGHT Ransomware Operations June 2022)

[HUI Loader](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1097) has the ability to disable Windows Event Tracing for Windows (ETW) and Antimalware Scan Interface (AMSI) functions.(Citation: SecureWorks BRONZE STARLIGHT Ransomware Operations June 2022)
